name: CORSAIR VENGEANCE RGB DDR5 RAM 32GB (2x16GB) 6400MHz CL36-48-48-104 1.35V Intel XMP 3.0 Desktop Computer Memory - Black (CMH32GX5M2B6400C36)
short_description: Dynamic Ten-Zone RGB Lighting: Illuminate your system with ten individually addressable, ultra-bright RGB LEDs per module, encased in a panoramic light bar for vivid RGB lighting from any viewing angle.
Onboard Voltage Regulation: Enables easier, more finely-tuned, and more stable overclocking through CORSAIR iCUE software than previous generation motherboard control.
Custom Intel XMP 3.0 Profiles: Customize and save your own XMP profiles via iCUE to tailor performance by app or task for greater efficiency.
Create and Customize: Choose from dozens of preset lighting profiles, or create your own in iCUE.
Maximum Bandwidth and Tight Response Times: Optimized for peak performance on the latest Intel DDR5 motherboards.
product_description: CORSAIR VENGEANCE RGB DDR5 memory delivers DDR5 performance, higher frequencies, and greater capacities optimized for Intel® motherboards while lighting up your PC with dynamic, individually addressable ten-zone RGB lighting. Tightly screened high-frequency memory chips enable faster processing, rendering, and buffering than ever, with onboard voltage regulation for easy, finely controlled overclocking. Take control with CORSAIR iCUE software and enable RGB lighting customization, real-time frequency monitoring, onboard voltage regulation, and Intel XMP 3.0 profile customization. A custom PCB provides superb signal quality for high performance and stability on the latest Intel DDR5 motherboards. For cutting-edge DDR5 performance with mesmerising RGB lighting, VENGEANCE RGB DDR5 lights the way.

Do not mix memory kits. Memory kits are sold in matched kits that are designed to run together as a set. Mixing memory kits will result in stability issues or system failure.

For Intel Z890, Intel Z790, Intel Z690, Intel B860, Intel B760, Intel B660, AMD X870, AMD X670, AMD B850, AMD B840, AMD B650, AMD A620 platforms. Refer to G.SKILL memory QVL or RAM Configurator tool on the G.SKILL website for more details on validated motherboard and hardware.
Usage in any manner inconsistent with manufacturer specifications, warnings, designs, or recommendations will result in lower speeds, system instability, or damage to the system or its components.
Memory kits will boot at JEDEC default SPD speed at default BIOS settings with compatible hardware.

For memory kits with XMP and/or EXPO overclock profile, enable XMP/EXPO/DOCP/A-XMP profile in BIOS to reach up to the rated potential XMP or EXPO overclock speed of the memory kit, subject to the use of compatible hardware. Enabling XMP or EXPO is an act of overclocking and requires BIOS setting adjustments.
Reaching the rated XMP or EXPO overclock speed and system stability will depend on the compatibility and capability of the motherboard and CPU used.

product_description: Upgrade your laptop memory with the Crucial 32GB DDR5 RAM Kit (2x16GB), designed to deliver high-speed performance for gamers, content creators, and professionals alike. With speeds up to 5600MHz, flexibility for 5200MHz, 4800MHz, and a CAS Latency of 40, this DDR5 memory ensures faster data transfers, smoother multitasking, and improved performance in demanding applications like 4K video editing, gaming, and data processing. Compatible with 12th and 13th Gen Intel Core processors and AMD Ryzen 7000 Series CPUs, this memory kit provides the performance needed for modern laptops. With 32GB of capacity, you can handle memory-intensive tasks and run multiple applications at once without slowdowns. This DDR5 RAM is also more energy-efficient than previous generations, allowing for longer-lasting system performance. This Crucial DDR5 32GB module kit supports Intel XMP 3.0 and AMD EXPO, enabling easy overclocking for enthusiasts looking to game at higher frame rates and/or maximize their system's potential. Installation is easy—just plug in the memory, and your laptop will be ready to handle the most demanding workloads. .

short_description: Low Latency, High Performance: Don't just chase megahertz. Experience snappier responsiveness with tight CAS Latency CL30 timings (30-36-36-76). This DDR5 RAM reduces wait states for the CPU, delivering faster data access in games and applications for a noticeable real-world speed boost.

Blazing 6000MHz Speed: Get a massive performance upgrade over DDR4 and standard DDR5. With a data rate of 6000MHz, this memory accelerates everything from game loading times and frame rates to file compression and content creation workflows.

One-Click Performance Boost: Achieve the optimal 6000MHz CL30 speed effortlessly. Pre-loaded Intel XMP 3.0 and AMD EXPO profiles allow you to enable the advertised performance with a single selection in your BIOS—no technical expertise required.

Universal Compatibility & Stability: Built for modern platforms. Certified to work flawlessly with Intel LGA1700 (700/600 Series) and AMD AM5 (Ryzen 7000 Series) motherboards. Engineered for unwavering stability and reliability right out of the box.

Cooler & More Efficient Operation: The sleek, aluminum heat spreader effectively manages thermals, while the advanced DDR5 architecture with PMIC (Power Management IC) operates at a lower 1.35V. This means cooler, more stable, and more power-efficient performance for your system.
